channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 01:52 Driven Alarm to Nikopol District. Watch for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 01:52 Driven Alarm to Nikopol District. Watch for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
